import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { // TODO: implement animations } }

WCLN

Wireless Communication Location Network

Advanced radar technology for precise target detection and visualization

Key Features

📡

Doppler Analysis

Precise velocity measurements with advanced Doppler technology

🎯

Target Detection

Real-time identification and tracking of multiple targets

📊

Data Visualization

Intuitive graphical representations of complex radar data
